hero.name: Ahmed Jayousi
hero.title: Frontend & Mobile Developer
hero.description: Passionate about creating user-friendly applications and innovative digital solutions. Specialized in Flutter, JavaScript, and web development.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Recent graduate with a passion for innovation and a commitment to technical excellence
about.trainingDetails: PHP Course • Python AI/ML • Multiple Online Courses
about.aspirationText: To become a proficient programmer, delivering high-quality applications and creative solutions that combine technical excellence with user-centric design.
about.description1: Recent graduate in Applied Computing with a strong foundation in programming languages and software concepts. Active participant in programming and software development projects.
about.description2: I'm passionate about web and mobile development, with hands-on experience in responsive design, UI/UX fundamentals, and full-stack applications. Participated in Expotech Palestine 2021 & 2022.
about.description3: Enthusiastic about lifelong learning and staying at the forefront of technological advancements. Experienced in team collaboration and Agile development, looking to contribute to innovative teams and make a meaningful impact in the tech industry.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: My journey in software development and programming
experience.alratebDesc: Assembling user-friendly applications for clients by upgrading UI components, fixing issues, and adding new features. Gaining hands-on experience with modern development tools, Git workflow, debugging, and requirement analysis. Collaborating with the development team on product lifecycles and high-quality software updates.
experience.freelanceDesc: Designing and implementing responsive web pages and developing personal and university projects.
experience.freelanceHighlight1: Frontend Development: Responsive web pages using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React with focus on usability and modern UI design
experience.freelanceHighlight2: Project Contributions: AI algorithms (Knight's Tour using BFS/DFS), VHDL structural designs, and mobile-responsive applications
experience.freelanceHighlight3: Game Development: Created games like Tic-Tac-Toe, Snake, and other interactive games with complete game logic and UI
experience.freelanceHighlight4: Version Control: Used Git/GitHub for project management and effective collaboration
experience.hopeCompany: The Hope International Company - Online Course

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my work and personal projects
projects.saleekDesc: Flutter mobile application for the West Bank providing real-time information about road gates. Users can see whether gates are open, congested, or closed with detailed history. Features interactive map with colored markers and collaborative status updates from taxi drivers.
projects.weddingPlannerDesc: Full-stack website using HTML, CSS, and PHP to help users plan weddings efficiently. Features guest management, budgeting, task tracking, and vendor coordination with an intuitive interface.
projects.onlineStoreDesc: Small online store using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript featuring product listings, responsive design, and user-friendly interface for online customer browsing.
projects.gpaCalculatorDesc: Desktop application in C# to help students calculate their GPA for semester or entire academic year with simple interface for inputting grades.
projects.moreProjects: Plus various mini projects including calculators, simulations, and interactive exercises
